EmailTemplate.description: Default Response Template for Web to Lead Leads
EmailTemplate.name: Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in AutoRABIT!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi %%First_Name%%, Thank you for your interest in AutoRABIT.
We will be in contact with you soon. Meanwhile, check out our blog post for more information on our products and services.
Sincerely, The AutoRABIT Team
